Headline: Temporary Eastbound #51 51st Reroute near 51st/Union
ShortDescription: Eastbound 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted near 51st/Union.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 55th, Wentworth, 51st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 51st/Union.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
